column2: an A.M. Eatery////The way I run to snooze at a moment's notice
column3: no matter the long lines or wait times babbbby!!?? That's my spot! I once visited snooze and finished my friend's food during brunch. I'm not sure if the strength of the cocktail made me go hard like that or if it's because the server was egging me on
column4: but it was delicious per usual. Every location is unbeatable.
